verses.verse: But there were <S%G5578>false<s%> <S%G5578>prophets<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> <S%G1722>among<s%> the <S%G2992>people,<s%> <S%G2532>even<s%> as there shall be <S%G5572>false<s%> <S%G5572>teachers<s%> <S%G1722>among<s%> you, <S%G3748>who<s%> <S%G3919>privately<s%> shall <S%G3919>bring<s%> in <S%G684>damnable<s%> <S%G139>heresies,<s%> <S%G2532>even<s%> <S%G720>denying<s%> the <S%G1203>Lord<s%> that <S%G59>bought<s%> them, and <S%G1863>bring<s%> on <S%G1438>themselves<s%> <S%G5031>swift<s%> <S%G684>destruction.<s%>

And <S%G4183>many<s%> shall <S%G1811>follow<s%> their <S%G684>pernicious<s%> <S%G684>ways;<s%> by <S%G1223>reason<s%> of <S%G3739>whom<s%> the <S%G3598>way<s%> of <S%G225>truth<s%> shall be <S%G987>evil<s%> <S%G987>spoken<s%> of.

And <S%G1722>through<s%> <S%G4124>covetousness<s%> shall they with <S%G4112>feigned<s%> <S%G3056>words<s%> <S%G1710>make<s%> merchandise of you: <S%G3739>whose<s%> <S%G2917>judgment<s%> now of a long <S%G1597>time<s%> <S%G691>lingers<s%> not, and their <S%G684>damnation<s%> <S%G3573>slumbers<s%> not.

For <S%G1487>if<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G5339>spared<s%> not the <S%G32>angels<s%> that <S%G264>sinned,<s%> but <S%G5020>cast<s%> them down to <S%G5020>hell,<s%> and <S%G3860>delivered<s%> them into <S%G4577>chains<s%> of <S%G2217>darkness,<s%> to be <S%G5083>reserved<s%> to <S%G2920>judgment;<s%>

And <S%G5339>spared<s%> not the <S%G744>old<s%> <S%G2889>world,<s%> but <S%G5442>saved<s%> <S%G3575>Noah<s%> the <S%G3590>eighth<s%> person, a <S%G2783>preacher<s%> of <S%G1343>righteousness,<s%> <S%G1863>bringing<s%> in the <S%G2627>flood<s%> on the <S%G2889>world<s%> of the <S%G765>ungodly;<s%>

And <S%G5077>turning<s%> the <S%G4172>cities<s%> of <S%G4670>Sodom<s%> and <S%G1116>Gomorrha<s%> into <S%G5077>ashes<s%> <S%G2632>condemned<s%> them with an <S%G2692>overthrow,<s%> <S%G4160>making<s%> them an <S%G5262>ensample<s%> to <S%G3588>those<s%> that <S%G3195>after<s%> <S%G3195>should<s%> live <S%G764>ungodly;<s%>
And <S%G4506>delivered<s%> <S%G1342>just<s%> <S%G3091>Lot,<s%> <S%G2669>vexed<s%> with the <S%G766>filthy<s%> <S%G391>conversation<s%> of the <S%G113>wicked:<s%>

(For that <S%G1342>righteous<s%> man <S%G1460>dwelling<s%> <S%G1722>among<s%> them, in <S%G990>seeing<s%> and <S%G189>hearing,<s%> <S%G928>vexed<s%> his <S%G1342>righteous<s%> <S%G5590>soul<s%> from <S%G2250>day<s%> to <S%G2250>day<s%> with their <S%G459>unlawful<s%> <S%G2041>deeds;<s%>)

The <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G1492>knows<s%> how to <S%G4506>deliver<s%> the <S%G2152>godly<s%> out of <S%G3986>temptations,<s%> and to <S%G5083>reserve<s%> the <S%G94>unjust<s%> to the <S%G2250>day<s%> of <S%G2920>judgment<s%> to be <S%G2849>punished:<s%>

But <S%G3122>chiefly<s%> them that <S%G4198>walk<s%> <S%G3694>after<s%> the <S%G4561>flesh<s%> in the <S%G1939>lust<s%> of <S%G3394>uncleanness,<s%> and <S%G2706>despise<s%> <S%G2963>government.<s%> <S%G5113>Presumptuous<s%> are they, <S%G829>self-willed,<s%> they are not <S%G5141>afraid<s%> to <S%G987>speak<s%> <S%G987>evil<s%> of <S%G1391>dignities.<s%>

<S%G3699>Whereas<s%> <S%G32>angels,<s%> which are <S%G3187>greater<s%> in <S%G2479>power<s%> and <S%G1411>might,<s%> <S%G5342>bring<s%> not <S%G989>railing<s%> <S%G2920>accusation<s%> <S%G2596>against<s%> them <S%G3844>before<s%> the <S%G2962>Lord.<s%>

But <S%G3778>these,<s%> as <S%G5446>natural<s%> <S%G249>brute<s%> <S%G2226>beasts,<s%> <S%G1080>made<s%> to be <S%G259>taken<s%> and <S%G5356>destroyed,<s%> <S%G987>speak<s%> <S%G987>evil<s%> of the things that they <S%G50>understand<s%> not; and shall <S%G2704>utterly<s%> <S%G2704>perish<s%> in their <S%G848>own<s%> <S%G5356>corruption;<s%>

And shall <S%G2865>receive<s%> the <S%G3408>reward<s%> of <S%G93>unrighteousness,<s%> as they that <S%G2233>count<s%> it <S%G2237>pleasure<s%> to <S%G5172>riot<s%> in the <S%G2250>day<s%> time. <S%G4696>Spots<s%> they are and <S%G3470>blemishes,<s%> <S%G1792>sporting<s%> themselves with their <S%G848>own<s%> <S%G539>deceivings<s%> while they <S%G4910>feast<s%> with you;

<S%G2192>Having<s%> <S%G3788>eyes<s%> <S%G3324>full<s%> of <S%G3428>adultery,<s%> and that <S%G180>cannot<s%> <S%G180>cease<s%> from <S%G266>sin;<s%> <S%G1185>beguiling<s%> <S%G793>unstable<s%> <S%G5590>souls:<s%> an <S%G2588>heart<s%> they <S%G2192>have<s%> <S%G1128>exercised<s%> with <S%G4124>covetous<s%> practices; <S%G2671>cursed<s%> <S%G5043>children:<s%>

Which <S%G2192>have<s%> <S%G2641>forsaken<s%> the <S%G2117>right<s%> <S%G3598>way,<s%> and are <S%G4105>gone<s%> <S%G4105>astray,<s%> <S%G1811>following<s%> the <S%G3598>way<s%> of <S%G903>Balaam<s%> the son of <S%G1007>Bosor,<s%> <S%G3739>who<s%> <S%G25>loved<s%> the <S%G3408>wages<s%> of <S%G93>unrighteousness;<s%>

But was <S%G2192>rebuked<s%> <S%G1649><s%> for his <S%G3892>iniquity:<s%> the <S%G880>dumb<s%> <S%G5268>ass<s%> <S%G5350>speaking<s%> with <S%G444>man's<s%> <S%G5456>voice<s%> <S%G2967>forbade<s%> the <S%G3913>madness<s%> of the <S%G4396>prophet.<s%>

<S%G3778>These<s%> are <S%G4077>wells<s%> <S%G504>without<s%> <S%G504>water,<s%> <S%G3507>clouds<s%> that are <S%G4064>carried<s%> with a <S%G2978>tempest;<s%> to <S%G3739>whom<s%> the <S%G2217>mist<s%> of <S%G4655>darkness<s%> is <S%G5083>reserved<s%> for <S%G165>ever.<s%>

For when they <S%G5350>speak<s%> <S%G5246>great<s%> <S%G5246>swelling<s%> words of <S%G3153>vanity,<s%> they <S%G1185>allure<s%> <S%G1722>through<s%> the <S%G1939>lusts<s%> of the <S%G4561>flesh,<s%> through much <S%G766>wantonness,<s%> <S%G3588>those<s%> that were <S%G3689>clean<s%> <S%G668>escaped<s%> from them who <S%G390>live<s%> in <S%G4106>error.<s%>

While they <S%G1861>promise<s%> them <S%G1657>liberty,<s%> they <S%G846>themselves<s%> are the <S%G1401>servants<s%> of <S%G5356>corruption:<s%> for of <S%G3739>whom<s%> a <S%G5100>man<s%> is <S%G2274>overcome,<s%> of the <S%G3778>same<s%> is he <S%G1402>brought<s%> in <S%G1402>bondage.<s%>

For <S%G1487>if<s%> after they have <S%G668>escaped<s%> the <S%G3393>pollutions<s%> of the <S%G2889>world<s%> <S%G1722>through<s%> the <S%G1922>knowledge<s%> of the <S%G2962>Lord<s%> and <S%G4990>Savior<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G5547>Christ,<s%> they are <S%G3825>again<s%> <S%G1707>entangled<s%> <S%G5125>therein,<s%> and <S%G2274>overcome,<s%> the <S%G2078>latter<s%> <S%G2078>end<s%> is <S%G5501>worse<s%> with them than the <S%G4413>beginning.<s%>

For it had <S%G2258>been<s%> <S%G2909>better<s%> for them not to have <S%G1921>known<s%> the <S%G3598>way<s%> of <S%G1343>righteousness,<s%> <S%G2228>than,<s%> after they have <S%G1921>known<s%> it, to <S%G1994>turn<s%> from the <S%G40>holy<s%> <S%G1785>commandment<s%> <S%G3860>delivered<s%> to them.

But it is <S%G4819>happened<s%> to them according to the <S%G227>true<s%> <S%G3942>proverb,<s%> The <S%G2965>dog<s%> is <S%G1994>turned<s%> to his <S%G2398>own<s%> <S%G1829>vomit<s%> <S%G1994>again;<s%> and the <S%G5300>sow<s%> that was <S%G3068>washed<s%> to her <S%G2946>wallowing<s%> in the <S%G1004>mire.<s%>
